character.noteList: Dwarf Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Advantage on saves vs poison, poison damage resistance • Double proficiency bonus to History checks concerning stonework (even if not proficient) • Battleaxe, handaxe, throwing hammer, warhammer proficiency Gain 1 extra hit point per level Folk Hero Feature: • Commoners are willing to shelter you from some trouble Class Features: • Regain half your level (min 1) worth of spell slots during a short rest (once per day) • Wizard Archetype: Transmutation • Half gold/time cost to copy school spells • You can alter the composition of objects (see rules) ⊠⊠Battleaxes, Handaxes, Throwing Hammers, Warhammers Daggers, Darts, Slings, Quarterstaffs, Light Crossbows ⊠Smith's Tools OR Brewer's Supplies OR Mason's Tools One type of artisan's tools Vehicles (land) ⊠Common, Dwarvish ⊠spellbook quarterstaff OR dagger component pouch OR arcane focus scholar's pack OR explorer's pack set of artisan's tools shovel iron pot set of common clothes belt pouch ⊠⊠Wizard 3⊠Hill Dwarf⊠Folk Hero⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Harbin Wester⊠Wizard 3⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠10⊠0⊠0
